Amidst profit-taking, Sven Carlin questions selling $AAPL after 10x gains. He cites elevated P/E (no longer value) & buybacks over capex (Buffett doubted). Carlin, who holds 40% $AAPL from $32, advises reevaluating your holding thesis & risk. Finding new 10x's is hard. #stocks #investing #BuffQuant
